        public int countAdjacentTiles(int pos,
                              int type,
                              int[] field)
        Counts the adjacent tiles of a given position of the specific type.
        Parameters:
        pos - Target point on the field.
        type - Which tile type to search for.
        field - The field to search tiles from.
        Returns:
        The amount of tiles found.

      • findUnsolvedNumbers

        public ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> findUnsolvedNumbers(int[] field)
        Finds all number tiles that have unrevealed tiles as neighbours. Saves tile coordinates to an ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        field - Current state of the minefield
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of found tiles' coordinates.

      • relativePos

        public int relativePos(int pos,
                       int truepos)
        Gets the absolute position of the wanted relative position. [0][1][2] [3][x][4] [5][6][7]
        Parameters:
        pos - Relative position to the target point
        truepos - Target point on the field
        Returns:
        Absolute position on the minefield. -1 if position is outside of the field.
